name: Word Climber
description:
The game is played by tapping on screen (or clicking for computers). Tapping changes your direction. Try to collect letters and guess the full word at the end.

This game is developed for Hyperjam 22

Developed By White Rabbit:

Oktay Turkdagli

Berhan Turku Ay

Goksel Elpeze

Taylan Sahin
